description:
Mii-kun, Conny and Isao learn to write – kind of. Kaede’s mandrake gets loose, and the gang sets out to bring it home before the unthinkable happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Grow All at Once, So I`ll Grow Over Time
Kyuu ni wa Muri Dakara Chotto Zutsu Ookiku Naru yo
きゅうにはむりだからちょっとずつ大きくなるよ
